imdb.plot outline: David "Lucky" Lycan is experiencing Murphy's Law in overdrive - his university grades are in a downward spiral, his girlfriend has left him, and to top it all off, he's just found out he has cancer - but discovering that the experimental treatment he's been signed up for has turned him into a werewolf, things start to get a bit hairy.
imdb.title: Bad Dog
plot: David "Lucky" Lycan is experiencing Murphy's Law in overdrive - his university grades are in a downward spiral, his girlfriend has left him, and to top it all off, he's just found out he has cancer - but discovering that the experimental treatment he's been signed up for has turned him into a werewolf, things start to get a bit hairy.
